data.name: WP9 2022 名馬にして名種牡馬 購入権セット 全３頭
data.detailed_description: A purchasable set that includes Gold Allure, Daiwa Major, and Heart's Cry, 3 famous horses that achieved results in several major classical style horse races, later becoming studs that sired many foals.
data.about_the_game: A purchasable set that includes Gold Allure, Daiwa Major, and Heart's Cry, 3 famous horses that achieved results in several major classical style horse races, later becoming studs that sired many foals.
data.short_description: A purchasable set that includes Gold Allure, Daiwa Major, and Heart's Cry, 3 famous horses that achieved results in several major classical style horse races, later becoming studs that sired many foals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 11 Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 各日本語64bit版
  • Processor: ■Windows8.1/10：Intel Core i3-4170 以上　■Windows11：Intel Core i3-8350K 以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ■Windows8.1/10：NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550Ti (1GB)以上、AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB)以上、1280×720　■Windows11：NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB)以上、AMD Radeon R7 360 (2GB)以上、1280×720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの
  • Additional Notes: ※1280 x 720ピクセル以上表示可能なディスプレイ　※Windows® 11をご使用の場合、メモリのシステム要件は4GB RAM、DirectX バージョンは12です。

  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの
